subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Dave and Steve arrive at the famed 17th hole at the T.P.C. at Sawgrass. They bet that the loser of the hole will buy the other player his favorite adult beverage.
snippet: Dave and Steve arrive at the famed 17th hole at the T.P.C. at Sawgrass. They bet that the loser of the hole will buy the other player his favorite adult beverage.
